about_the_game:
The first puzzle in the futuristic collection Space Empire is named Echoes. The author of the digital illustration is Christian Hecker and some of our long-term players are already familiar with his incredible art. As usual, Christian delivers amazing detail, stunning colors, and a grand vision.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. The combination of distinct objects as well as uniform landscape and colors should prove a medium challenge to most puzzle builders.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Space Empire. You won't be disappointed.
